org.mini2Dx.ui.element

Class Container

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.UiElement
      • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.ParentUiElement
        • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.Column
          • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.Container
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Hoverable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbsoluteContainer, AlignedContainer, Modal

    public abstract class Container
extends Column
    A base class for containing UiElements to be added to a UiContainer. Container can act as a window through UiTheme styles.
